title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve
title_original: GreenMount Women's 100% Pure Cashmere Cardigan Sweater Soft and Warm Long Sleeve Oversize Loose Cardigan with Pocket

specs.Best Sellers Rank: #279,884 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #1,763 in Women's Cardigans

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Sweaters > Cardigans

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I would order this again
items.body: It was precisely what I ordered. Warm, soft and comfortable Read more
items.author: Barbara Belden

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and comfortable
items.body: Very soft and comfortable. Good length. Looks good on. Only complaint is that I would like the cashmere to be a little thicker but adequate for the price. Read more
items.author: Capt Tom

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thin, Lightweight, Soft, True to Size
items.body: This cardigan is true to size. It is a thin cashmere, wonderfully lightweight, warm & soft. I really like the style & the color. The “Lightbrown” looks just like the Amazon photos. I carefully hand washed this in cold water, gently pulled it back into shape & laid flat to dry. It came out great. This comes in a simple but elegant, dark green, cardboard, gift box so would be ready for gifting – it makes a very nice presentation. Read more
items.author: Katawampas

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely soft
items.body: Well, it took a long while for this product to get to me. Over a month, I guess? It got lost in the mail... But when it did come to my door (finally!), I was very impressed, first by the high quality box (I mean, I do notice the attention to detail), and then by the cardigan which is absolutely cloud soft, everything I expected from cashmere. It's my first cashmere cardigan - I've been wanting to get one for a while now but I never could justify the cost - and I'm not ever going back. I've been converted! It's soft and warm, but it's also not so warm that you'll sweat when the temps rise a bit during a windy autumn or southern winter day. It's my new favorite. I wore it for Christmas. It looked very respectable. I felt very fancy (and warm). Read more
items.author: Tina Mailhot-Roberge

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True Cashmere
items.body: This sweater has the soft feel and style of cashmere. I like the earthtone color which makes it complement many other colors. The sleeves fit at the wrist with the length of the sweater fits comfortably below the hips. The collar is versatile and the pockets are a nice accent but also functional. This sweater is a great wardrobe addition. Read more
items.author: J Bibb

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice sweater.
items.body: This is a very nice sweater. It fits as described and is good quality. It is itchy, so beware if you have sensitive skin. Read more
items.author: J.B.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Off-white, Beige, Lightbrown. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
